attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THE EUROPEAN UNION HAS PUT TO MUCH OF  
A STRAIN ON THE INFRASTRUCTURE OF THIS 
COUNTRY WITH ITS FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT   
CAUSING OVER CROWDING OF THE PRISONS   
MELTDOWN OF THE N.H.S. UNEMPLOYMENT RISING, HOUSING SHORTAGE,MORE CONGESTION
ON THE ROADS AND THE PROBLEMS IT CAUSES FOR THE EDUCATION SYSTEM.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
